Package org.unidue.campusfm.queerzard.cms.database.services.impl

Class ArticleServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unidue.campusfm.queerzard.cms.database.services.impl.ArticleServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArticleService
    @Service
public class ArticleServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArticleService
    This class implements the ArticleService interface and provides the implementation for various methods related to article management.
